string.name: text
string.value: While trying to install some software from my new Cannon PowerShot S40 camera today I came across a new tab on the file properties dialog of Windows 2003 .NET Server.  The tab is a "Compatibility" tab that I don't recall seeing previously (although it is probably on XP and I just don't remember it.)  Anyway, I thought I just wanted to make a note of it.  The purpose of the tab is to allow you to configure the application so that a different OS is emulated when it runs.
